sections.heading: of premises; by whom made; liability and compensation of sheriff; postponement of sale; notice
sections.text: (1) All sales of mortgaged premises under a decree shall be made by a sheriff or some other person authorized by the court in the county where the premises or some part of them are situated. In all cases w

sections.heading: only to mortgage and tax foreclosures. Cochran v. Cochran, 1 Neb. Unof. 508, 95 N.W. 778 (1901).
